definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: Immersed in the ceramic culture and rhyme flow, let you sigh not straight.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸在陶瓷文化的脈脈流韻中，直讓你感嘆不虛此行。
